meanings.definition: A medical procedure in which a thin tube with a light and camera is inserted into the uterus to examine the lining.
meanings.sent1: During hysteroscopies, doctors can see inside the uterus clearly.
meanings.sent2: The hospital performed many hysteroscopies last month.
meanings.sent3: The hysteroscopies seemed like a tiny adventure into the body.
meanings.sent4: Her uterus was a hidden world revealed by the hysteroscopies.
meanings.sent5: The hysteroscopies showed a fascinating view of the uterus.

meanings.definition: The plural form of hysteroscopy, referring to multiple instances of the procedure.
meanings.sent1: After several hysteroscopies, the doctor had a better understanding of the patient's condition.
meanings.sent2: The clinic scheduled back-to-back hysteroscopies for efficiency.
meanings.sent3: The hysteroscopies piled up on the doctor's schedule like busy bees.
meanings.sent4: In her medical career, she had seen countless hysteroscopies.
meanings.sent5: The room was filled with the echoes of past hysteroscopies.
